title: WTB: Chance (Batting), Crawford (w/Bat), Cobb (b/o) for PSA 4-5 set
author: ZiggerZagger

posts.post_title: WTB: Chance (Batting), Crawford (w/Bat), Cobb (b/o) for PSA 4-5 set
posts.post_content:
Looking for the following HOF'ers to close out my PSA 4-5 set.  Down to the last HOF cards.  Right at 444/524 now on the whole ball of wax.
Focus for these HOF'ers is on Centering primarily.   PP Gift is at the ready.

--Chance (Batting)
--Crawford (w/ Bat)
...and I do need a Cobb (Bat off), but who doesn't.  :D


[STRIKE]--Flick[/STRIKE]   Old-School Trade!
[STRIKE]--Kelley[/STRIKE]   Purchased
[STRIKE]--Keeler (w/Bat)[/STRIKE]   Purchased
[STRIKE]--Marquard (Pitching)[/STRIKE]   Purchased
[STRIKE]--Mathewson (Portrait)[/STRIKE]   Purchased
[STRIKE]--Ed Walsh[/STRIKE]   Purchased
[STRIKE]--Vic Willis (Batting)[/STRIKE]   Purchased

.

Well, all that I can say is that we have some amazing Board members on here...  as if that wasn't already clear.

Have already picked up 3 beautiful HOF'ers, as well as unexpectedly adding about 50 more T206's in PSA 4-5 from my list.
Now at 444/520, and closing fast.

Very deep thanks to the 2 board members who have been beyond generous and helpful.  What a pleasure!

Happy to add more from the list, if anyone has these remaining 7 HOF'ers!


Happy 2020!! :D

Few more added.  Now down to 4 HOF'ers and at 462/524 overall in graded 4-5.

Still looking, and thanks to all.

.
